category.name: filebase.acp.file
category.item: Do you really want to delete the option field “{$option->optionTitle|language}”?
Default option value suggested on first edit.

You can provide one select option per line, for example to be used in combination with the selection types. Please be aware that using the colon will cause the system to use everything to the left as an internal identifier and only the part after the colon will be displayed to the user. This allows one to change the value shown to the user without harming already existing selections unless the identifier is being changed itself.
You can provide a regular expression to validate the user input.

category.name: filebase.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this category? All child categories of this category will be moved to this category's parent category. Files which are only in this category will be deleted.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enables the ability to sell files. You can restrict the availability based on user group permissions.
Value-added tax in percent; Will be added on top of the selling price
You may define a different storage location on disk. Previously uploaded files have to be manually moved to the new directory.
Show user’s file count in profile
Users are required to specify a version for each uploaded file
Files are required to be associated with a license agreement. Users may chose from a list of pre-defined licenses.
Users can provide a custom license agreement.
Require users to accept the license agreement
Users are required to accept the license agreement in order to download / purchase the product.
Maximum number of selected categories per file
You can select which types of files should be allowed, you must select at least one type.
Files and file versions within the trash bin will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Users can upload an optional icon that will be used to present the file.

Used on the file list and dashboard boxes, it will limit the data for comments, likes, downloads, sells and revenue to a certain period of time. The cached data is updated asynchronously using a cronjob.
Restricts statistics to use only data not older than the set amount of time. [time in days]
